statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, discount_rate FROM loyalty_program WHERE discount_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, discount_rate FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id < 10;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, discount_rate FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points < 50 AND loyalty_points IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points, discount_rate FROM loyalty_program WHERE discount_rate >= 0.05 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE discount_rate < 0.1;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_name, discount_amount FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_program_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN loyalty_programs ON customers.loyalty_program_id = loyalty_programs.program_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount_amount > 5.00 ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT count(program_id), AVG(discount_amount) FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_program_id IS NULL;
SELECT program_name, discount_amount FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount_amount BETWEEN 2.00 AND 7.00;
SELECT customer_name, program_name FROM customers JOIN loyalty_programs ON customers.loyalty_program_id = loyalty_programs.program_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_name, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM customers ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs JOIN customers ON loyalty_programs.program_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT program_id, program_name, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY program_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_points FROM customers WHERE total_points >= 1000 ORDER BY total_points ASC, customer_name;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs WHERE program_name LIKE '%gold%' ORDER BY program_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_program_id FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT discount_id, discount_amount, start_date, end_date FROM discounts WHERE program_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT program_name, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount_rate > 0.1;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE customers.loyalty_program_id = loyalty_programs.program_id);
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT email FROM customer WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT code, discount_amount FROM discount_codes WHERE expiration_date > CURDATE();
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, customer.email, loyalty_program.program_name, loyalty_program.discount_percentage FROM customer JOIN loyalty_program ON customer.loyalty_points > 50 AND customer.loyalty_points < 200;

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, purchase_history.purchase_date, purchase_history.total_amount FROM customer JOIN purchase_history ON customer.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_history.total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_history.total_amount DESC;

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, discount_codes.code, discount_codes.discount_amount, discount_codes.expiration_date FROM customer JOIN customer_discounts ON customer.customer_id = customer_discounts.customer_id JOIN discount_codes ON customer_discounts.code_id = discount_codes.code_id WHERE customer_discounts.discount_claimed = TRUE;
